org.mundo.service
Class ServiceInfo

java.lang.Object
  org.mundo.service.ServiceInfo
All Implemented Interfaces:
IActivate
Direct Known Subclasses:
ServiceInfoFilter
public class ServiceInfo
extends java.lang.Object
implements IActivate

Objects of this class contain descriptions of services. They are typically returned by the query functions provided by ServiceManager.

Author:
Erwin Aitenbichler
See Also:
ServiceManager

filterInterface

_getExternalTypeName

public java.lang.String _getExternalTypeName()
Description copied from interface: IActivate
Returns the unique type name for the external representation of this object, that is shared by all platforms and implementations. Typically this is the XSI (XML Schema Instance) type name.

Specified by:
_getExternalTypeName in interface IActivate
